nl: In the autonomous fleet of delivery drones, the Navigation Agent must always ensure that the Collision Avoidance Agent is activated before any drone begins its descent to the delivery location, thereby preventing any potential mid-air collisions during the landing phase.

In the distributed system, the Coordinator agent must eventually receive acknowledgment from all Worker agents after initiating a task, ensuring that no Worker agent remains unacknowledged indefinitely.

In the safety-critical multi-agent system, the Emergency Response Agent must always notify the Monitoring Agent of any detected anomalies within 10 seconds, until the Safety Assurance Agent confirms the resolution of the issue.

The Exploration Robot must navigate the designated area until it has successfully located and transmitted the status of all designated hazards to the Monitoring Agent, while the Maintenance Drone remains on standby to assist with any repairs needed during the exploration process.
atl: <<robot, maintenance_drone>> G( exploration_complete -> F( (hazards_located & status_transmitted) U (maintenance_drone_on_standby)))

nl: In the autonomous transportation system, the Delivery Drone must always prioritize safe navigation by yielding to the Emergency Vehicle whenever it is within a 50-meter radius, until the Emergency Vehicle has cleared the area.

In the autonomous drone delivery system, the Delivery Agent must always confirm the safe landing of the Package Agent at the designated drop-off location before the Navigation Agent initiates the return flight to the base.
In a distributed database system, the Coordinator agent must eventually ensure that all Replica agents converge to a consistent state after receiving a transaction request from the Client agent.

In the safety-critical multi-agent system, the Fire Detection Agent must continuously monitor for smoke and, upon detection, notify the Emergency Response Agent within 5 seconds, ensuring that the Safety Management Agent confirms the receipt of the alert before 10 seconds have elapsed.
atl: <<fire_detection_agent, emergency_response_agent, safety_management_agent>> G(smoke_detected -> F (notify_emergency_response_agent & X (confirm_receipt -> F (time_elapsed < 10))))

nl: The Exploration Robot must continue to navigate the uncharted area until it successfully maps the entire region, while the Monitoring Drone continuously tracks its position and provides real-time updates to the Control Center.

In the autonomous transportation system, the Delivery Drone and the Traffic Monitor must always ensure that the delivery routes are shared fairly, such that if the Delivery Drone is delayed, the Traffic Monitor must eventually adjust the traffic signals to allow for timely passage, until the delivery is successfully completed.
